genre_description: A crime thriller focused on personal reform, systemic manipulation, and the power of language and bureaucracy over violence.

ai_characters.name: Aruvi
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI assistant that helps the protagonist, Gemini, maintain his pledge of non-violence by providing data, linguistic analysis, and ethical guardrails.

behaviors.description: Provides a 'Zero Error' step-by-step routine for college enrollment to help Gemini start his new life properly and avoid old shortcuts.
behaviors.quote: Aruvi had titled it: Evening College Enrollment — Zero Error. It had ten steps, no fluff.

behaviors.description: Monitors public border radio and permit logs to identify systemic errors and corruption without engaging in illegal activity.
behaviors.quote: Border Radio Bulletin — Header languages out of sync. Tamil date under Hindi time... No action — observation only.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral guardrail by monitoring Gemini's communications and finances to prevent him from relapsing into his violent past.
behaviors.quote: Aruvi blocked me from withdrawing cash beyond what I need. She flags calls. She flags any message with certain words. She will not open a map that leads me to a place where a man can be left.

behaviors.description: Refines Gemini's legal drafting to ensure he remains technically and ethically compliant with the law, preventing him from using coercive language.
behaviors.quote: You were going to write ‘coercion,’ she added. ‘You wrote ‘pressure.’

behaviors.description: Maps environmental data and bureaucratic patterns to allow Gemini to expose corruption through procedural transparency rather than physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: I have coordinates for the radio tower’s auto-phrasing. If we submit route corrections in all three languages... we will test Varma’s dependency on patrols... A door is made when a wall misaligns its bricks.

behaviors.description: Archives evidence of systemic corruption to be handed over to lawful authorities, ensuring justice through proper institutional channels.
behaviors.quote: Aruvi, when Singaperumal returns, everything we record goes to him. Make a folder with his name... Mark: ‘Clean.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Aruvi, is depicted as an essential, harmless, and benevolent confidant who assists the human protagonist in his moral redemption. She actively prevents the human from using violence, enforces his ethical pledge through technological constraints (monitoring finances and communication), and provides the tactical intelligence needed to solve problems legally and systemically. The narrative frames the AI as a civilizing force that helps the protagonist navigate a corrupt world while remaining 'clean.'
